item.title: Julia Bayer
item.description: ðŸ”— Twitter | Quiztime What was your OSINT highlight of 2020? Starting my career as an investigative journalist with the main focus on OSINT. What emerging (good or bad) trends did you notice over the past year? Good: More attention and more interest in OSINT skills in journalism and other fields. Any favorite tool or technique that you tried in 2020? So many. One: The Gap Analysis How do you see the OSINT landscape changing in 2021?
